game.name: ChimpUP!
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 크로스 플랫폼 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: ChimpUP! is a chaotic co-op climbing party game where you and your friends race and play minigames. Armed with two independent grapple hooks for arms, compete to the top in a fast-paced fashion. Master the movement, sabotage your friends, race to the top, create cosmetics and maps.
game.shortDescriptionEn: ChimpUP! is a chaotic co-op climbing party game where you and your friends race and play minigames. Armed with two independent grapple hooks for arms, compete to the top in a fast-paced fashion. Master the movement, sabotage your friends, race to the top, create cosmetics and maps.
